1.text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar, Pontius Pilate being governor of Judea, Herod being tetrarch of Galilee, his brother Philip tetrarch of the region of Ituraea and Trachonitis, and Lysanias tetrarch of Abilene,

2.text: during the high priesthood of Annas and Caiaphas, the word of God came to John, the son of Zacharias, in the wilderness.

3.text: He came into the entire region around the Jordan, preaching the baptism of repentance for remission of sins.

4.text: As it is written in the book of the words of Isaias (Isaiah) the prophet, saying:  The voice of one crying in the wilderness,   “Make ready the way of the Lord.   Make his paths straight.

5.text: Every valley will be filled.   Every mountain and hill will be brought low.   The crooked will become straight,   and the rough ways smooth.

6.text: All flesh will see God’s salvation.”

7.text: To the multitudes who went out to be baptized by him, John said, “You offspring of vipers, who warned you to flee from the wrath to come?

8.text: Therefore, bring forth fruits worthy of repentance. Do not begin to say among yourselves, ‘We have Abraham as our father;’ for I tell you that God is able to raise up children to Abraham from these stones!

9.text: Even now, the axe also lies at the root of the tree, and so every tree that does not bring forth good fruit is [to be] cut down and thrown into the fire.”

10.text: The multitudes asked him, “What then must we do?”

11.text: John answered them, “Whoever has two coats should give to the one who has none. He who has food should do likewise.”

12.text: Tax collectors also came to be baptized, and they asked him, “Teacher, what must we do?”

13.text: He replied, “Do not collect more than what is appointed to you.”

14.text: Soldiers also asked him, “What about us? What must we do?” He said to them, “Do not accuse [anyone] wrongfully, and extort from no one by violence. Be satisfied with your wages.”

15.text: As the people were in expectation, and everyone reasoned in their hearts concerning John, whether perhaps he was the Christ,

16.text: John answered them all, “I indeed baptize you with water, but the one who is coming is more powerful than I! I am not worthy to untie the strap of his sandals! He will baptize you in the Holy Spirit and fire!

17.text: His winnowing fan is in his hand, and he will thoroughly cleanse his threshing floor. He will gather the wheat into his barn; but the chaff he will burn up with unquenchable fire.”

18.text: With many other exhortations, he preached Good News to the people.

19.text: But Herod the tetrarch, being reproved by him for Herodias, his brother’s wife, and for all the evil things which he had done,

20.text: added this also to them all, that he shut up John in prison.

21.text: Now it happened, after all the people were baptized, that Jesus was also baptized. As he was praying, heaven was opened,

22.text: and the Holy Spirit descended in a bodily form as a dove on him. A voice came out of heaven which said “You are my beloved Son! In you I am well pleased.”

23.text: Jesus himself, when he began to teach, was about thirty years old, being the son (as was supposed) of Joseph, the son of Heli,

24.text: the son of Matthat, the son of Levi, the son of Melchi, the son of Jannai, the son of Joseph,

25.text: the son of Mattathias, the son of Amos, the son of Nahum, the son of Esli, the son of Naggai,

26.text: the son of Maath, the son of Mattathias, the son of Semein, the son of Josech, the son of Judah,

27.text: the son of Joanan, the son of Rhesa, the son of Zerubbabel, the son of Shealtiel, the son of Neri,

28.text: the son of Melchi, the son of Addi, the son of Cosam, the son of Elmodam, the son of Er,

29.text: the son of Jose, the son of Eliezer, the son of Jorim, the son of Matthat, the son of Levi,

30.text: the son of Simeon, the son of Judah, the son of Joseph, the son of Jonan, the son of Eliakim,

31.text: the son of Melea, the son of Menan, the son of Mattatha, the son of Nathan, the son of David,

32.text: the son of Jesse, the son of Obed, the son of Boaz, the son of Salmon, the son of Nahshon,

33.text: the son of Amminadab, the son of Aram, the son of Joram, the son of Hezron, the son of Perez, the son of Judah,

34.text: the son of Jacob, the son of Isaac, the son of Abraham, the son of Terah, the son of Nahor,

35.text: the son of Serug, the son of Reu, the son of Peleg, the son of Eber, the son of Shelah,

36.text: the son of Cainan, the son of Arphaxad, the son of Shem, the son of Noah, the son of Lamech,

37.text: the son of Methuselah, the son of Enoch, the son of Jared, the son of Mahalaleel, the son of Cainan,

38.text: the son of Enos, the son of Seth, the son of Adam, the son of God.
